sentences.en: But Ma Chin was adamant and insisted that she should be taken round.
sentences.cn: 可是玛金很固执,一定要她们引着去.

sentences.en: Eva was adamant that she would not come.
He was adamant in his refusal.
He was adamant that he should go.
He was adamant that she should not go.
He was adamant that the allegations were untrue, so I took him on trust.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为那些指控不属实，因此我也完全相信他。

sentences.en: He was adamant that this setback does not mean he has reverted to type.
sentences.cn: 他坚持认为这次挫折并不意味着他已经回到原来的样子。

sentences.en: In the matter of " comp'ny " Mammy was equally adamant.
sentences.cn: 嬷嬷 在住宿方面的态度也一样坚决.

sentences.en: Ke Tso - fu sat tight - lipped and silent, adamant as ever.
sentences.cn: 克佐甫不作声了, 薄嘴唇闭得紧紧地,也是同样的坚决.

sentences.en: She became as rigid as adamant.
sentences.cn: 她变得如顽石般的固执.

sentences.en: She begged me to change my mind, but I remained adamant .
sentences.cn: 她求我改变主意，但我坚决不肯。

sentences.en: She was adamant in refusing to comply with his wishes.
sentences.cn: 她固执地拒绝按他的意愿办.

sentences.en: She was still adamant; her face was flushed, but her lips were bloodless.
sentences.cn: 玛金还是很坚持, 脸是通红, 嘴唇却变白了.

sentences.en: Sue was adamant about that job in Australia.
sentences.cn: 对澳大利亚的那份工作，休的态度很坚决。

sentences.en: The young man pressed his suit, but the girl was adamant.
sentences.cn: 那个年轻人苦苦求婚, 但那位姑娘无动于衷.

sentences.en: Veronica was quite adamant that they should stay on.
sentences.cn: 维罗妮卡坚信他们必须继续留下去.
